Room.Name: The Northern Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the northern path around the Barbarian Pits.
Room.LongDescription: The northern path curves sharply to the east and south here. To the south, you can see the entrance where you entered the Barbarian Pits. Looking to the east, you can see that the path heads towards the Ramdes River. A giant hedge is located north of the Pits, but you cannot leave that way. The heavy brush and steep slope prevent you from leaving anywhere except the entrances.
